Text: Need help with firmware to flash Bios - Crystal Chip CC 1.1 - to be able to play games at homeburned DVDs

Works great. I even converted it to NTSC. No problems at all. 
Thanks changoboy. My son will love this.
How do i burn this on a dvd, please help me.

1. Rename the files by putting .rar in the end of each filename
2. Unrar it with winrar
3. Burn with Nero or Alcohol 120%
